pullRequest.title: Fix syntax error on SKIP directives

commit.message: fix: Fix syntax error on SKIP directives #630

nodes.bodyText: Here I expect that line with PROGRAM-ID will be skipped. So that means that here will be an error on DATA DIVISION line: "Syntax error on 'DATA' expected PROGRAM_ID".
